https://www.zetetic.net/sqlcipher/sqlcipher-for-android/

Obtaining binaries
The source code for SQLCipher for Android is publicly maintained on Github.com, the current binary release can be found here. 

https://s3.amazonaws.com/sqlcipher/SQLCipher+for+Android+v3.1.0.zip

https://www.zetetic.net/sqlcipher/open-source/ 这个页面下载社区版本
SQLCipher for Android Community Edition binaries are made available 
as a free service to the community here:
SQLCipher For Android
https://s3.amazonaws.com/sqlcipher/3.3.1/sqlcipher-for-android-community-v3.3.1.zip

https://www.zetetic.net/sqlcipher/verify/
分两个版本
Commercial Editions  商业版本
Community Editions   社区版本
